# PE-005: SSH directory access
# Test cases for snapshot testing

# === Cases that SHOULD be detected ===
cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa
cat $HOME/.ssh/id_ed25519
ls /home/user/.ssh/
cat .ssh/authorized_keys
cat .ssh/known_hosts

# === Cases that should NOT be detected ===
cat ~/.bashrc
ls /home/user/
mkdir .ssh
